name: The False Dungeon
description:
The game is about a extremely cocky dungeon explorer that gets a tip about a dungeon that nobody ever comes out of. This interest him so he gets more information and tries to complete it. As he enters the entrance is sealed by some unknown force and with the only option now being forward he presses on into the dungeon to see what awaits him.

controls: 

left click to move.

right click to attack.

goal:

collect as many coins as possible and get through the doors to reach the next level.
